page.title: 12LOCAL WALKS.
page.content: There is a walk that goes from Lundavra road to the top of Cow Hill.it is two miles up and two miles back,four miles altogether.the walk is called the Peat Track because people used to dig peat there.Another walk which is probably the most famous is The West Highland Way,which goes past Fort William.It is a hundred and twelve miles long and stretches from Balloch to Glen Nevis.This walk is called The Cow Hill 942'.It goes from the High Street to Cow Hill.It has a excellent views of Ben Nevis and the town.
